charges.charge_description: 21:856=CM.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - MANUFACTURE - defendant knowlingly and intentionally maintained a place at Latitude 31 48 55.026N and Longitude 102 29 06.798W for the purpose of manufacturing, distributing and using Methamphetamine and Cocaine, both Schedule II Controlled Substances, and Marijuana, a Schedule I Controlled Substance, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Section 856(a)(1).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed count 1 without prejudice on government's motion.

charges.charge_description: 21:856=CM.F On or about 6/25/2014 in the county of Ector in the Western District of Texas defendant knowingly and intentionally maintained a place for the purpose of manufacturing and distributing methamphetamine, cocaine and marijuana in violation of Title 21 USC 856(a)(1), 21:856=CM.F, 21:856=MD.F, 21:856=CM.F
